item.description:
Good spot, thanks Andy.

I’ve passed this on to the publisher contact.

Josh

item.title: [Rejected] New Organisation Identifier: XI-IATI-CIS redux
item.dc:creator: andylolz
item.description:
As per @matmaxgeds’ JSON snippet above, I think the wrong org identifier may have been used.

XM-OCHA-HPC3238 is the org identifier for “CARE International”.

XM-OCHA-HPC8568 is the org identifier for “CARE International Switzerland in Sudan”.

Read full topic

item.title: [Rejected] New Organisation Identifier: XI-IATI-CIS redux
item.dc:creator: JoshStanley
item.description:
Hi Matt,

They have indeed chosen to go with CARE international foundation Switzerland in Sudan as their Publisher name - https://iatiregistry.org/publisher/cis

Josh

Read full topic

item.title: [Rejected] New Organisation Identifier: XI-IATI-CIS redux
item.dc:creator: matmaxgeds
item.description:
RE closed topic: [Rejected] New Organisation Identifier: XI-IATI-CIS

I suggest using the name “CARE International Switzerland in Sudan” then, as opposed to “CARE International - Switzerland” as originally suggested in the org-ID proposal.

{
  "id": 3238,
  "abbreviation": "CARE",
  "name": "CARE International",
  "categories": [
    {
      "id": 118,
      "name": "NGO",
      "group": "organizationType"
    }
  ]
},
{
  "id": 8568,
  "abbreviation": "CIS",
  "name": "CARE International Switzerland in Sudan",
  "categories": [
    {
      "id": 118,
      "name": "NGO",
      "group": "organizationType"
    }
  ]
}

Read full topic
